spring.description: Terrible storms and cloying mud underfoot.
Normal weather, partially cloudy with occasional showers.
Clear skies and cool weather day and night.
Blue skies, refreshing breezes, and perfect weather.

summer.description: Summer storms, sweltering heat, and/or bone-dry conditions.
High humidity or bad dry-heats with little water.
Sunny days with a good mixture of heat and brisk breaks with humid showers.
Clear skies and gentle breezes create a cool and sunny atmosphere.
Glorious weather that feels far too temperate and refreshing for the middle of summer.

fall.description: Horrible weather, driving rain, and freak storms cause horrendous conditions.
Gloomy skies, chilly weather, and heavy rainstorms.
Normal fall weather with occasional rain and warm days.
Cool weather, pleasant humidity, gentle breezes, and little rain.
Clear skies, fine breezes, and crisp air provide a wondrous feeling.

winter.description: Terrible blizzards, driven snowbanks, and howling winds create a frozen hellscape.
Heavy snow and frozen earth create an icy landscape.
Light snows and chill winds prove no match for good winter clothing.
Cloudy days with sporadic snowfall make a pleasant atmosphere that only slightly chills the tip of the nose.
The land is blanketed in a thin layer of soft white snow under a clear sky, creating a beautiful and magical winter wonderland.
